org.apache.flink.storm.util

类 AbstractBoltSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.storm.util.AbstractBoltSink
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    backtype.storm.task.IBolt, backtype.storm.topology.IComponent, backtype.storm.topology.IRichBolt, Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    BoltFileSink, BoltPrintSink

    public abstract class AbstractBoltSink
extends Object
implements backtype.storm.topology.IRichBolt
    Implements a sink that write the received data so some external output. The result is formatted like (a1, a2, ..., an) with Object.toString() for each attribute).
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
